biocontainers.name: netreg
biocontainers.summary: netReg fits linear regression models using network-penalization.

biotools.summary: Fits linear regression models using network-penalization. Graph prior knowledge, in the form of biological networks, is being incorporated into the loss function of the linear model.

bioschemas.name: netReg
bioschemas.summary: Fits linear regression models using network-penalization. Graph prior knowledge, in the form of biological networks, is being incorporated into the loss function of the linear model.
